title: 7 Things The Coronavirus Fears? Thai Paper Publishes Misleading Report
content: Ultraviolet is able to kill COVID-19 if it is exposed to the concentrated UV ray in a certain amount of time and distance," Dr. Pokrath Hansasuta, an assistant professor of virology in Chulalongkorn University's Department of Microbiology, explained to AFP by phone on March 18, 2020. "However, that level of UV exposure is harmful to human's skin.
warning: Based on the content, language and advertisements on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
